name: Mewtwo ex
author: aky CG Works
tera_effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Transfer Charge
attacks.effect: Attach up to 2 Basic {P} Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Photon Kinesis
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each {P} Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
